abstract: Muscle cars built in the 1960s by Baldwin Chevrolet and the Motion Performance tuning shop, both in Baldwin, NY, are now sought after, rare and expensive.
snippet: The muscle car offspring of the 1960s union between a Long Island auto dealer and the Motion Performance tuning shop are now sought after, rare and expensive.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: The muscle car offspring of the 1960s union between a Long Island auto dealer and the Motion Performance tuning shop are now sought after, rare and expensive.

headline.main: Encore for a Muscle Car Legend
